vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and (1) an ordinance granting a Planned Development District for MU-1 Mixed Use District uses; and (2) an ordinance granting the termination of Specific Use Permit No. 1057 for an establishment for the care of alcoholic, narcotic, and psychiatric patients on property zoned an MF-2(A) Multifamily District, on the west side of North Westmoreland Road and south of Canyon Bluff Boulevard
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval, subject to a development plan and conditions and approval of the termination of Specific Use Permit No. 1057
Z201-159(RM)
